class_d_04_language_01:
Aujourd’hui—today—we take our midterm exam!
Détendez-vous—relax, that is—and do your best![VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_04_language_02: Êtes-vous prêts—are you ready? Let’s begin![VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_04_question_01:
1. Gracias, arigato, merci, and xièxie all share
    the same meaning. What is it?

A) Thank you
B) Good-bye
C) Good night
class_d_04_question_02:
2. Which of the following means “delicious”?

A) Au revoir
B) Délicieux
C) Nǐhǎo
class_d_04_question_03:
3. Which of these phrases doesn’t belong?

A) Ich liebe dich
B) Je t’aime
C) Te amo
D) Time to eat
class_d_04_question_04:
4. When speaking with a person, what is the
    first step to smooth communication?

A) Compliment them
B) Get mad at them
C) Bury them in flattery
class_d_04_question_05:
5. What is your beloved teacher’s name?

A) Theodore
B) Leonore
C) Salvatore
D) Salvador
class_d_04_language_03:
C’est fini! Time is up! Posez vos stylos—put down
your pens, that is![VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_04_language_04:
I hope that was easy enough for you. Especially
that dernière question—that last question![VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_04_language_05:
I’m sure you all did great! Bravo, my friends! You
can check your scores at the school’s front desk.[VAR 0114(0026)]
